promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple lion steel-type pokemon wearing regal armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sandarmorlie, a a chibi young simple lion steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Windup Cannon, Dusk Shot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "steel" or "Sandarmorlie". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lion-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This robust, cub-sized creature thrives in arid wilderness, its metallic hide offering protection. Its Windup Canon and Dusk Shot make it a sunset warrior.
